data.title: Just Plain Weird
data.text: Just about everything about my experience at this location was weird. Ordering was difficult when it didn't need to be. My husband and I only wanted sandwiches not the "meal deal" with sodas etc. Well it was very difficult to get this across to the person taking our order. She would say a word or two then stop and grin for a few seconds at random intervals. She just couldn't get the order correct and the crazy grinning was unnerving. After maybe 5 tries I was able to order a sandwich but my husband was still stuck with the meal (he just gave up and threw away the stuff he didn't want).  Every inch of the place was dirty so we left and ate in the car. Not even good sandwiches after all that. We have eaten at this chain at other locations but we won't even give this place a second chance,

data.title: Its okay
data.text: This place makes you wait since they cook your food when you order. My favorite is teriyaki chicken wings are the best, I just love the sauce more than the wings.

data.title: Cockroaches?
data.text: My girlfriend I got hungry around 10:30pm we decided to go to the drive thru of Miami in Pompano Beach Florida the lady at the order menu came off a little rude. The food seems to be a little bit overpriced for quality, and quantity.The drinks are full of way too much ice .When I was picking up my food I saw cockroaches crawling in the windows . The entire trip home we felt grossed out not a fan of this particular Miami subs it may be a long time till ; if we ever go back. To top it off I only got three sips out of my drink before it was empty. They have given me the wrong size Cup . Not a really happy camper.

data.title: wheres the meat
data.text: the sub was very sloppily made - very little meet  tone of lettuce  and not  something I would go back for
